source_objects.title: Food & Beverage
source_objects.description: Learn how to decorate a cake, prepare a gourmet meal, identify different wine varietals and much more.

items.title: The Ultimate Guide to Frostings
items.headline: The perfect course to learn how to make frostings of all flavors.  Great for bakers and cake decorators!
objectives_summary: Explore various types of frostings from simple glazes to cooked meringue buttercreams.
Learn how to weigh ingredients with a digital kitchen scale.
Practice hands-on techniques like kneading and folding.

items.title: Cook Like a Wok Star!

visible_instructors.name: Eleanor
visible_instructors.job_title: cooking teacher, creator Wok Star Kit, blogger
visible_instructors.title: Eleanor Hoh

items.headline: Easy, Healthy, Fast Cooking for busy lifestyles.  NO-recipe, NO-measuring technique!
objectives_summary: Stir fry crunchy vegetables and sear meat so it's succulent & juicy
Organize your workspace so cooking will go smoothly and quickly
Cut vegetables the Asian way for best presentation and cooking time

items.title: Plated Desserts Made Simple #1: Elegant Chocolate Towers

visible_instructors.name: Irit
visible_instructors.job_title: Award-winning pastry chef, Founder of CakeNuvo
visible_instructors.title: Irit Ishai

items.headline: Make stunning and incredibly yummy plated desserts and chocolate decorations that are sure to impress everyone!
objectives_summary: Advance your baking & decorating career by learning a huge variety of critical recipes and sophisticated decoration skills.
Apply CakeNuvo's "principle of balance" to create desserts that are true culinary masterpieces.
Create unique and stylish chocolate and mousse-based desserts.

items.title: Artisan Bread for Beginners
items.headline: Learn how to fit beautiful, hand-made breads into even the busiest lifestyle.
objectives_summary: Bake a whole basket of different artisan breads, understand the key principles of baking with yeast and how to fit regular baking into even the busiest lifestyle.

items.title: Become a Great Baker #2: Cheesecake Extravaganza

visible_instructors.name: Irit
visible_instructors.job_title: Award-winning pastry chef, Founder of CakeNuvo
visible_instructors.title: Irit Ishai

items.headline: Learn how to create perfect cheesecakes, stunning personal desserts, and sophisticated decorations!
objectives_summary: Advance your baking career by learning a huge variety of critical recipes and sophisticated decoration skills.
Create many kinds of cheesecakes, leveraging modern designs and stunning presentations
Customize the recipes to match any taste, and add surprising, bold and unexpected flavors using various sauces and spices.

items.title: Master Pie Making | Pie & Tart Pastry Baking Course
items.headline: Learn how to make critically acclaimed pies & tarts. Step-by-step Marie guides you through 20 recipes from her pie shop
objectives_summary: Learn how SIMPLE it is to make delicious PASTRY DOUGH
master 2o SWEET and SAVORY pies & tarts
understand the basics to an EASY all butter crust

items.title: Basic Italian Cooking Skills
items.headline: Learn how to cook like a genuine italian chef
objectives_summary: After my course, student will be able to cook 16 of the most important italian recipes, how to combine flavors and serve tasty meals.

items.title: Japanese Pastry Course #4 Japanese Roll cake
items.headline: Learn how to bake three different types of soft and fluffy roll cake batter and different types of cream fillings.
objectives_summary: Become an expert at baking three different types of delightfully soft and fluffy roll cake batter.
Learn how to make delicious different fillings.
Learn the technique for rolling the cake beautifully.

items.title: Learn How to Brew Your Own Beer and Start Your Own Brewery
items.headline: Learn the process of brewing beer and building your own craft beer brewery
objectives_summary: learn the fundamentals of starting a brewery

items.title: Ultimate Home Bartending Masterclass
items.headline: This course provides an exciting Home Bartending introduction into making Cocktails, Soda, Coffee, & Tea.
objectives_summary: The course will be taught as a guided Home Bartending step by step on how to make Cocktails, Soda, Coffee, & Tea.

items.title: Coffee Latte Art 101
items.headline: How to create picture worthy latte art
objectives_summary: Know the science of milk
Steam milk properly
Pour latte art hearts

items.title: All About Cupcakes
items.headline: The ultimate cupcake baking guide
objectives_summary: Learn to bake the perfect cupcake the right way! With dozens of cupcake flavors, fillings, frosting and decorations all from scratch.
Learn all the various techniques of preparing and baking cupcakes.
Work on amazing fillings and toppings such as pastry cream, lemon curd, chocolate ganache, caramel and many more.

items.title: #4 Ancient Chinese Science of Tea Blending and Wellness

visible_instructors.name: Shana
visible_instructors.job_title: ITA Tea Master, Tea Author, Tea Artisan & Tea Hunter
visible_instructors.title: Shana Zhang

items.headline: ITA Certified Tea Courses. Achieve deep healing relief with the essential skill of blending your own teas
objectives_summary: Learn the details of how a professional tea blender(tea taster) does their tea blending job
Learning how you can achieve soothing, deep healing relief with the essential skill of blending your own teas
You will obtain the key to finding and choosing the right ingredients to blend with tea

items.title: Perfect French Macarons #2 - Designer Macarons

visible_instructors.name: Irit
visible_instructors.job_title: Award-winning pastry chef, Founder of CakeNuvo
visible_instructors.title: Irit Ishai

items.headline: Create stunning macarons in any shape you want, and turn them into works of art using many decoration techniques
objectives_summary: Learn the secrets of creating macaron cookies in any shape you like
Master a huge variety of decoration skills and techniques for cookies, cakes and desserts
Work on many unique macaron designs and learn how to customize them to any theme or concept

items.title: Introduction to Tea
items.headline: Learn the basics about tea - where it's from, how it's made, and how to brew a great cup!
objectives_summary: Understand more about where tea comes from and what goes into making a great cup of tea - from bush to cup.

items.title: Online Vegan Vegetarian Cooking School

visible_instructors.name: Angela
visible_instructors.job_title: Life & health Coach, Counsellor & Plant-Based Nutritionist
visible_instructors.title: Angela Poch

items.headline: Learn to cook delicious vegan recipes. Filmed over 10 years ago, watch the first 2hrs FREE to see if it's right for you.
objectives_summary: Develop skills to cook vegan
Getting Started Vegan Cooking - measuring, kitchen tips, organizing your vegan cupboards, and how to become vegan or vegetarian.
Understand basic nutrition for vegans and vegetarians
